member.name: P:System.Net.WebClient.AllowReadStreamBuffering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data read from the Internet resource for a instance.
member.returns: Returns . true to enable buffering of the data received from the Internet resource; false to disable buffering. The default is true.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebClient.AllowWriteStreamBuffering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data written to the Internet resource for a instance.
member.returns: Returns . true to enable buffering of the data written to the Internet resource; false to disable buffering. The default is true.

The to send to the resource.
member.returns: Returns . The task object representing the asynchronous operation. The property on the task object returns a array containing the response sent by the server.
member.exception: The address parameter is null. -or- The data parameter is null.

The URI formed by combining , and address is invalid. -or- method cannot be used to send content. -or- There was no response from the server hosting the resource. -or- An error occurred while opening the stream. -or- The Content-type header is not null or "application/x-www-form-urlencoded".

member.returns: true if the default credentials are used; otherwise false. The default value is false.
